Description:
AI agents are reshaping modern workflows, unlocking new efficiencies while introducing new challenges for security and governance. In this deep dive, experience live demos of purpose-built security capabilities from Microsoft Security solutions. Leave equipped with best practices to confidently secure and govern AI agents in your organization.

BRK264 | English (US) Breakout | Intermediate (200) #MSIgnite, #ProtectcloudAIplatformandapps

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction by Ramya Chitrakar at Microsoft Ignite 00:02:37 - Rising Attack Surfaces and Novel Threat Vectors in Agentic AI 00:05:01 - Introducing Microsoft Agent 365 as the Control Plane for Agents 00:14:09 - Understanding Attack Paths with Cloud Resources and Graph Database 00:17:25 - Announcing Three New Defender Capabilities for AI Agents 00:20:32 - Demo of Java Customer Helper Agent Operations 00:21:43 - Discussion on Security Risks and Attacker Simulation Setup 00:22:45 - Responsible AI System Blocks Attacks via Copilot Studio 00:23:26 - Defender Correlates Attempts and Generates Security Alerts
Title: From Risk to Resilience: Secure your AI Agents with Microsoft Defender | BRK264
Author: Microsoft Events
